ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:0.5_0: 4. The training rule on used robes
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.2_0: At that time Venerable Udāyī’s former wife had become a nun.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.5_0: And Udāyī shared his meals with that nun.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.6_0: One morning Udāyī robed up, took his bowl and robe, and went to her.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.6_1: She then uncovered her genitals in front of her and sat down on a seat.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.7_0: She too uncovered her genitals in front of him and sat down on a seat.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.8_0: He then complained and criticized her, and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.9_0: He then said to that nun:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.10_0: “Sister, get some water; I’ll wash the robe.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.11_0: “Give it to me, Venerable, I’ll wash it.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.12_0: She then took some of the semen in her mouth and inserted some into her genitals.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.13_0: Because of that she became pregnant.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.15_0: “This nun isn’t abstaining from sexuality; she’s pregnant.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.16_0: She said, “Venerables, I do abstain from sexuality,” and she told them what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.17_0: The nuns complained and criticized the monks from the group of six,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.18_0: “How can Venerable Udāyī have a nun wash a used robe?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.19_0: Those nuns then told the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.20_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.21_0: “How can Venerable Udāyī have a nun to wash a used robe?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.22_0: They rebuked Udāyī in many ways and then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned Udāyī:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.23_0: “Is it true, Udāyī, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.27_0: “Foolish man, a man and a woman who are not related don’t know what’s appropriate and what’s inappropriate in dealing with each other, what’s inspiring behavior and what’s not.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.28_0: And still you got an unrelated nun to wash a used robe.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.29_0: Foolish man, this won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.30_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.31.1_0: ‘If a monk gets an unrelated nun to wash, dye, or beat a used robe, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.6_0: ’s mother’s side, of pure descent, irrefutable and impeccable in questions of ancestry back to the seventh paternal generation.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.11_0: If he tells him, “Wash it,” he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.12_0: When it has been washed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.13_0: If he tells the dyer, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.14_0: When it has been dyed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.15_0: If he tells her to beat it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.16_0: When she has struck it once with her hand or with an implement, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.17_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.18_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.20_0: ‘Venerables, this used robe which I got an unrelated nun to wash is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.21_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.24_0: ‘I give these tonics back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.1_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.2_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash and dye a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.3_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash and beat a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.4_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash, dye, and beat a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and two offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.5_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.6_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye and beat a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.7_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye and wash a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.8_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye, beat, and wash a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and two offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.9_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to beat a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.10_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to beat and wash a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.11_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to beat and dye a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.12_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to beat, wash, and dye a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and two offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.13_0: If she is unrelated, but he is unsure of it, ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.14_0: If she is unrelated, but he perceives her as related ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.15_0: If he gets her to wash a used robe belonging to someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.16_0: If he gets her to wash a sitting mat or a sheet, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.17_0: If he gets a nun who is fully ordained only on one side to do the washing, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.18_0: If she is related, but he perceives her as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.19_0: If she is related, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.20_0: If she is related, and he perceives her as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.22_0: if she cooks it with her companion messenger, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.24_0: if he gets a nun to wash an unused robe;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.25_0: if he gets a nun to wash any requisite apart from a robe;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.26_0: if it is a trainee nun;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.27_0: if a novice nun is giving directions;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.30_0: The fourth rule, the training rule on used robes, is finished.
